description:
Ashibe-kun wanted to gather chestnuts, so his grandpa bought a mountain for him! Goma-chan has never had chestnuts before, so he`s excited, too! Now, let`s all go pick up chestnuts together! The gang searches the ground in a grove of chestnut trees, but... what? There are no chestnuts anywhere. Then they find some mysterious footprints... Could the one who ate all the chestnuts be the unidentified creature Cheskenstein?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: くりひろいはナゾだらけ
